Football
lead_paragraph: A group of 13 trustees described the events during the week that led to the firings of Joe Paterno and the university president Graham B. Spanier amid a sexual abuse scandal.
snippet: A group of 13 trustees described the events during the week that led to the firings of Joe Paterno and the university president Graham B. Spanier amid a sexual abuse scandal.
